20110107073429.000|20110107073432.000|CC1| I'm going to hell; I know it.  
20110107073432.000|20110107073432.000|CC1|       And I don't want         
20110107073432.000|20110107073433.000|CC1|        to go to hell,          
20110107073433.000|20110107073433.000|CC1|      and really because        
20110107073433.000|20110107073435.000|CC1|   I don't like new places.

20110107073437.000|20110107073437.000|CC1|       'Cause I'm afraid        
20110107073437.000|20110107073438.000|CC1|       I'll go to hell,
